publications.title: Generation of the induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with autosomal recessive ABCA4-mediated Stargardt Macular Dystrophy

donor.disease_description: Recessive mutations in the ABCA4 gene cause Stargardt disease, an early-onset autosomal recessive degenerative disease.

genomic_modifications.genotype: Compound heterozygous ABCA4 c.4139C > T and c.5461-10T > C
genomic_modifications.description: Reprogramming of patient dermal fibroblasts was performed using episomal plasmids.

genomic_characterisation.summary: Karyotyping confirmed that LEIi007-A had a normal karyotype.

ethics.institutional_HREC: Human Research Ethics Office, University of Western Australia
